ai-ja337:1.4_0: I see it as a mistake.”
ai-ja337:2.4_0: ‘Surely the teaching must have been someone else at this time!’”
ai-ja337:3.3_0: I prepared a seat for water,
ai-ja337:4.1_0: This principle is the nature of families,
ai-ja337:4.4_0: I will see the highest goal.”
ai-ja337:5.1_0: The seventh sub-chapter on benches is finished.
